language.name: English
item.yuushya.pos_trans_item.line1: §9Mainhand: Rightclick a [Entity Block] to adjust the selected [Layer]'s offset
item.yuushya.pos_trans_item.line2: §9Offhand: Rightclick to switch the tool's modes(3 in total)
item.yuushya.pos_trans_item.line4: §9Use F3 to know which axis to adjust
item.yuushya.pos_trans_item.switch: X Offset:%s Y Offset:%s Z Offset:%s
item.yuushya.micro_pos_trans_item.line2: §9Mainhand: Rightclick a [Entity Block] to fine-tune its offset
item.yuushya.micro_pos_trans_item.line3: §9Offhand: Rightclick to switch the tool's modes(4 in total)
item.yuushya.micro_pos_trans_item.line4: §9Slightly adjust the [Entity Block Layer]'s status to prevent Z-Fighting
item.yuushya.micro_pos_trans_item.switch: X Offset:%s Y Offset:%s Z Offset:%s
item.yuushya.rot_trans_item.line1: §9Mainhand: Rightclick a [Entity Block] to rotate the selected [Layer]
item.yuushya.rot_trans_item.line2: §9Offhand: Rightclick to switch the tool's modes(3 in total)
item.yuushya.rot_trans_item.line4: §9Use F3 to know which axis to adjust
item.yuushya.rot_trans_item.switch: X Rotation:%s Y Rotation:%s Z Rotation:%s
item.yuushya.scale_trans_item.line2: §9Mainhand: Rightclick and leftclick a [Entity Block] to scale the selected [Layer]
item.yuushya.slot_trans_item.line1: §9Mainhand: Rightclick or leftclick a [Entity Block] to switch its currently selected layer
item.yuushya.slot_trans_item.line2: §9Continuously leftclick to switch to the blank [ Layer]
item.yuushya.slot_trans_item.line4: §9Offhand: Rightclick a [Entity Block] to let it be shown or not
item.yuushya.slot_trans_item.slot.fail.m: No.Top, you can put the blockstate by Gourd of Copy&Paste
item.yuushya.get_showblock_item.line2: §9Rightclick to turn a block to a [Entity Block]
item.yuushya.get_blockstate_item.line2: §9Mainhand: Right click a normal block to copy its Blockstates
item.yuushya.get_blockstate_item.line3: §9Offhand: Rightclick a [Entity Block] to apply the copied to its currently selected [Layer]
item.yuushya.get_lit_item.line1: §9Switch on or off a [Entity Block]'s Lighting
item.yuushya.get_lit_item.line2: §9Mainhand: Leftclick or rightclick a [Entity Block] to adjust its brightness
item.yuushya.move_transformdata_item.lin: §9Mainhand: Right click a normal block to cut its current layer
§9Offhand: Rightclick a [Entity Block] to apply the cut to its currently selected [Layer]
item.yuushya.destroy_item.line1: §9Click to get Entity Block without NBT loss
item.yuushya.destroy_item.line2: §9Right Click on an Entity Block to copy NBT to Entity Block item in the offhand
item.yuushya.gui_item.line1: §9Right click on an [Entity Block] to open a screen
item.yuushya.gui_item.line2: §9You can modify the values and layers within this screen
gui.showBlockScreen.mode.slider.tooltip: Values are changed on a fixed scale
gui.showBlockScreen.mode.edit.tooltip: Allows manual input of values. Press the button on the right to apply the values, and press the button on the left to reset them.
item.yuushya.engrave_item.line1: §9Hold [Entity Block] in the off-hand and right-click to open a screen for selecting saved local modelling works.
item.yuushya.engrave_item.line2: §9In the [Modelling GUI Terminal] screen, saved modelling works will be displayed in this interface.
item.yuushya.engrave_item.line3: §9Local modelling works are saved in the 'modellings' folder under the version folder.
gui.showBlockScreen.workshop.share_hint: You can share it with your friends.
gui.showBlockScreen.workshop.save: Save modelling work as local file
gui.showBlockScreen.workshop.save.tip: Save the modelling work under this filename in [./Version Folder/modelling]
gui.showBlockScreen.display.add: Add block or blockstate in the offhand to list
gui.showBlockScreen.display.replace: Replace selected block or blockstate with in the off hand
